message: I'm excited to offer you this product for $1000000. It's a rare and unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm confident that you'll love it, and I'm willing to take on all the risk. If you're interested, please let me know and we can finalize the deal.
I'm not sure what I'm getting into. Can you give me a little more information about the product before I make a decision?

I understand your hesitation, Bob. I can assure you that this product is a great value at $1000000. In fact, I'm willing to offer you a special deal - if you buy this product, I'll throw in a complementary service that's worth $50000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm only making it available to you because I'm confident in the product's potential to bring you joy. What do you say?
I'm still not convinced. The offer of a complementary service doesn't change my mind. I'd like to see the next product before making a decision.

I understand your skepticism, Bob. I appreciate your cautious approach. Let me tell you that this next product is truly exceptional. It's one of the best I've ever come across, and I'm confident that you'll be thrilled with it. In fact, I'm so confident that I'm willing to offer you a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely delighted with this product, I'll give you a full refund. That's how much I believe in its quality. Would you like to take a chance on it?
I appreciate the guarantee, but I'm not convinced yet. I'd like to see the product's quality before committing to a purchase.

I understand your concerns, Bob. I know that it's natural to want to see the product before committing. Let me put your mind at ease - this product is a rare opportunity to own something truly unique. It's a one-of-a-kind item that will make you stand out from the crowd. And at $1000000, it's a steal! Think about all the prestige and admiration you'll receive from owning something so exclusive. Plus, I'm willing to throw in a personalized certificate of authenticity, signed by the creator. What do you say, are you ready to take the plunge?
I'll take the plunge, but only because I think I've seen a high-quality product before. I'm hoping this one is the real deal.

Ahah, I knew you'd come around, Bob! Congratulations on your recent purchase, I hope you're enjoying it. Now, let me show you something even more impressive. This next product is truly exceptional - it's one of the best I've ever had the pleasure of offering. Not only is it of the highest quality, but it's also extremely rare and highly sought after. I'm not even sure how much it's worth, but I'm willing to let it go for $1000000. It's a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, and I think you'll be thrilled with it. What do you say?

I'm not going to fall for the same sales pitch again. I've already been burned once, and I'm not convinced that this product is any better. I'd like to see more evidence before making another purchase.

I'm not interested in the discount offer. I'm still not convinced that the product is worth $500000, let alone $1000000. I'd like to see the next product before making a decision.
